copying or modifying any instructions contained in the pdf when writing your own pattern either by rewording or cut and pasting into a new document and passing it off as a new original work you are strictly prohibited from using any of the images or logos contained in any or all patterns social media or website you must not profit from any such copying including offering a free pattern on a personal website with ads you must not use any of my written works in whole or in part to create video tutorials in english or any other languages on any platform under any circumstances e g
